title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: When the workbench is restarted, the recently used files (MRU list) in the File menu are not shown.
EB: The recently used files should be persisted between sessions and appear in the File menu MRU list even after restarting the workbench.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Start the workbench.
2. Open 2 or 3 files.
3. Shutdown the workbench.
4. Restart the workbench.
5. Check if the recently used files are displayed in the File menu MRU list.
